abstract: California Gov Jerry Brown proposes $10,000 fines for residents and businesses wasting water as part of state's conservation mandates, brought on by drought.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Jerry Brown of California on Tuesday called for $10,000 fines for residents and businesses that waste the most water as cities try to meet conservation mandates during the drought.

headline.main: California: Water Wasters Could Be Fined $10,000
headline.print_headline: California: Water Wasters Could Be Fined $10,000

snippet: Gov. Jerry Brown of California on Tuesday called for $10,000 fines for residents and businesses that waste the most water as cities try to meet conservation mandates during the drought.
